thread.title: BRIEF-Ryan J. Morris Says Notified Infusystem Of Interest To Discuss Strategic Transaction With Co

title: BRIEF-Ryan J. Morris Says Notified Infusystem Of Interest To Discuss Strategic Transaction With Co

organizations.name: brief-ryan j. morris says notified infusystem of interest to discuss strategic transaction with co

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Ryan J. Morris:
* RYAN J. MORRIS SAYS NOTIFIED INFUSYSTEM HOLDINGS THAT THEY WOULD LIKE TO DISCUSS POSSIBILITY OF NEGOTIATING STRATEGIC TRANSACTION WITH INFUSYSTEM TO ACQUIRE INFUSYSTEM
* RYAN J. MORRIS SAYS INFUSYSTEM HAS INDICATED TO RYAN J. MORRIS THAT IT DID NOT WANT TO ENGAGE IN DISCUSSIONS ON POSSIBILITY OF STRATEGIC TRANSACTION
* RYAN J. MORRIS SAYS DELIVERED LETTER TO INFUSYSTEM NOMINATING SLATE OF SIX DIRECTOR CANDIDATES FOR ELECTION TO ITS BOARD Source text: ( bit.ly/2Fhv8DJ ) Further company coverage:
